Lexar to Showcase Professional Photo and Gaming Product Lineups at CES 2024
Products to Include Cutting-Edge CFexpress Cards, Next-Gen Performance SSDs, Blazing-Fast Memory Modules, and More
SAN JOSE, Calif., Jan. 4, 2024 /PRNewswire-PRWeb/ --
Featured Products
Professional CFexpress™ 4.0 Type B Card DIAMOND Series
Professional CFexpress™ 4.0 Type A Card GOLD Series
Professional GOLD microSD™ UHS-II Card
ARMOR 700 Portable SSD
Professional NM1090 M.2 PCIe Gen 5 NVMe™ SSD with Heatsink
Professional NM800 PRO M.2 2280 NVMe™ SSD with and without Heatsink
PLAY M.2 2230 PCIe 4.0 SSD
ARES RGB DDR5 8400MT/s
Lexar, a leading global brand of flash memory solutions, is excited to reveal its product lineup to be showcased at this year's CES in Las Vegas, Nevada. With products ranging from its tried-and-true professional photography and videography portfolio to its robust gaming line-up, the breadth of Lexar products will be on display.
Lexar will be showcasing its cutting-edge Professional CFexpress 4.0 Type B Card DIAMOND Series which leverages the latest PCIe Gen 4 for the powerful performance and accelerated post-production efficiencies that professionals demand—a blistering-fast max. read speed of 3600MB/s and max. write of 3300MB/s.* For Type-A gear users, Lexar will show the Professional CFexpress 4.0 Type A Card GOLD Series. It also utilizes PCIe Gen 4 technology and is the world's fastest CFexpress Type A card with max. read speeds of 1800MB/s and max. write speeds of 1650MB/s.* The Professional GOLD microSD UHS-II Card will also be displayed. Recommended by GoPro for use with their action cameras, it delivers max. read speeds of 280MB/s and max. write speeds of 180MB/s* and comes in capacities up to 256GB. Another highlight for the professional crowd will be the ARMOR 700 Portable SSD. Ruggedly built, it's ready to go on location in even the toughest environments and delivers relentless performance and superior reliability with max. read and write speeds of 2000MB/s.*
On the gaming side, Lexar will reveal the Professional NM1090 M.2 PCIe Gen 5 NVMe SSD with Heatsink. Featuring PCIe Gen 5 performance with max. read speeds of 12,000MB/s and max. write speeds of 11,000MB/s,* it is nearly twice as fast as PCIe Gen 4.** Lexar will also show the award-winning NM800 PRO M.2 2280 NVMe SSD and its newest iteration of the NM800 PRO which includes an integrated heatsink, with capacities up to 8TB. The PLAY M.2 2230 PCIe 4.0 SSD packs big performance into a small form factor that is perfect for handheld gaming consoles and M.2 2230 compatible laptops. It delivers max. read speeds of 5200MB/s and max. write speeds of 4700MB/s,* and leverages SLC dynamic cache to keep load times and downloads fast. Lexar will also show its blazing-fast gaming DRAM, ARES RGB DDR5, which clocks in at 8400MT/s and with timing as low as CL40.
"We are excited to be able to share several cutting-edge products with everyone at CES, including the world's fastest CFexpress Type A card and our latest high-performance gaming DRAM," said Joey Lopez, Director of Marketing.
Lexar at CES 2024Visit Lexar at The Venetian, Suite #29-104 (3355 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109) from January 9-12, 9 AM - 6 PM. All media are welcome to visit and experience our innovative new products.
Media ElementsPress Images
About LexarFor more than 25 years, Lexar has been trusted as a leading global brand of memory solutions. Our award-winning lineup includes memory cards, USB Flash Drives, card readers, solid-state drives, and DRAM. With so many options, it's easy to find the right Lexar solution to fit your needs.
Disclosures*Speeds based on internal testing. Actual performance may vary.**Comparison based on published performance of PCIe 4.0 drives. Actual performance may vary.
Social MediaInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/lexarmemory/X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/lexarmemoryFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/lexarmemoryYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/LexarMemoryOfficialLinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/lexarmemoryThreads: https://www.threads.net/@lexarmemory
Lexar. 1737 N First Street, Suite 680, San Jose, CA USA
Media Contact
Noel Lo, Lexar International, 7149872498, noello@radiancesynergy.com, https://www.lexar.com/en/

SOURCE Lexar International

Posted in: Game Hardware, Games, Video Games | Tagged: CES 2024, Lexar
Lexar Will Have New Photo & Gaming Product Lineups At CES 2024
Lexar has revealed they will have multiple products on display at CES 2024, specifically for professional photography and gaming.
Article Summary
Lexar revealed they will be bringing a few new items to CES 2024, as the company will be highlighting many new items for gamers and photography buffs. The company is planning to show off new options for memory and processing with their new CFexpress cards, as well as multiple high-performance SSDs. We have more details from the company's announcement below as their new products will be on display from January 9-12 in Las Vegas.
Lexar will be showcasing its cutting-edge Professional CFexpress 4.0 Type B Card DIAMOND Series, which leverages the latest PCIe Gen 4 for the powerful performance and accelerated post-production efficiencies that professionals demand—a blistering-fast max. read speed of 3600MB/s and max. write of 3300MB/s. For Type-A gear users, Lexar will show the Professional CFexpress 4.0 Type-A Card GOLD Series. It also utilizes PCIe Gen 4 technology and is the world's fastest CFexpress Type A card with max. read speeds of 1800MB/s and max. write speeds of 1650MB/s. The Professional GOLD microSD UHS-II Card will also be displayed. Recommended by GoPro for use with their action cameras, it delivers max. read speeds of 280MB/s and max. write speeds of 180MB/s and comes in capacities up to 256GB. Another highlight for the professional crowd will be the ARMOR 700 Portable SSD. Ruggedly built, it's ready to go on location in even the toughest environments and delivers relentless performance and superior reliability with max. read and write speeds of 2000MB/s.
On the gaming side, Lexar will reveal the Professional NM1090 M.2 PCIe Gen 5 NVMe SSD with Heatsink. Featuring PCIe Gen 5 performance with max. read speeds of 12,000MB/s and max. write speeds of 11,000MB/s, it is nearly twice as fast as PCIe Gen 4. Lexar will also show the award-winning NM800 PRO M.2 2280 NVMe SSD and its newest iteration of the NM800 PRO, which includes an integrated heatsink, with capacities up to 8TB. The PLAY M.2 2230 PCIe 4.0 SSD packs big performance into a small form factor that is perfect for handheld gaming consoles and M.2 2230 compatible laptops. It delivers max. read speeds of 5200MB/s and max. write speeds of 4700MB/s, and leverages SLC dynamic cache to keep load times and downloads fast. Lexar will also show its blazing-fast gaming DRAM, ARES RGB DDR5, which clocks in at 8400MT/s and with timing as low as CL40.

Products to Include Cutting-Edge CFexpress Cards, Next-Gen Performance SSDs, Blazing-Fast Memory Modules, and More.
Featured Products
Lexar, a leading global brand of flash memory solutions, is excited to reveal its product lineup to be showcased at this year’s CES in Las Vegas, Nevada. With products ranging from its tried-and-true professional photography and videography portfolio to its robust gaming line-up, the breadth of Lexar products will be on display.

Recommended by GoPro for use with their action cameras, it delivers max. read speeds of 280MB/s and max. write speeds of 180MB/s* and comes in capacities up to 256GB. Another highlight for the professional crowd will be the ARMOR 700 Portable SSD. Ruggedly built, it’s ready to go on location in even the toughest environments and delivers relentless performance and superior reliability with max. read and write speeds of 2000MB/s.*
On the gaming side, Lexar will reveal the Professional NM1090 M.2 PCIe Gen 5 NVMe SSD with Heatsink. Featuring PCIe Gen 5 performance with max. read speeds of 12,000MB/s and max. write speeds of 11,000MB/s,* it is nearly twice as fast as PCIe Gen 4.** Lexar will also show the award-winning NM800 PRO M.2 2280 NVMe SSD and its newest iteration of the NM800 PRO which includes an integrated heatsink, with capacities up to 8TB. “We are excited to be able to share several cutting-edge products with everyone at CES, including the world’s fastest CFexpress Type A card and our latest high-performance gaming DRAM,” said Joey Lopez, Director of Marketing.

results.title: Lexar to Showcase Professional Photo and Gaming Product Lineups at CES 2024
results.content: Lexar at CES 2024. Visit Lexar at The Venetian, Suite #29-104 (3355 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109) from January 9-12, 9 AM - 6 PM. All media are welcome to visit and experience our innovative new products. CES 2024 Gaming Lexar M.2 microSD Card NVMe Photo Professional CFexpress 4.0 SSD.
results.raw_content:
Lexar to Showcase Professional Photo and Gaming Product Lineups at CES 2024
Lexar, a leading global brand of flash memory solutions, is pleased to announce its product lineup, which will be on display at this year’s CES in Las Vegas, Nevada.
A variety of Lexar goods will be on exhibit, ranging from its tried-and-true professional photography and videography portfolio to its comprehensive gaming line-up and portable storage.
Lexar will be showcasing their cutting-edge Professional CFexpress 4.0 Type B Card DIAMOND Series, which uses the newest PCIe Gen 4 for the tremendous performance and improved post-production efficiency that professionals require—a blistering-fast speed. 3600MB/s read speed and max. 3300MB/s write.
Professional CFexpress 4.0 Type A Card GOLD Series will be available from Lexar for users of Type-A hardware. It also uses PCIe Gen 4 technology and is the world’s fastest CFexpress Type A card with max. Maximum read rates are 1800MB/s. Write rates of 1650MB/s are possible.
The Professional GOLD microSD UHS-II Card will also be on exhibit. It is highly recommended by GoPro for usage with their action cameras. read rates of up to 280MB/s and max. It has write speeds of 180MB/s and storage sizes of up to 256GB.
Lexar will unveil the Professional NM1090 M.2 PCIe Gen 5 NVMe SSD with Heatsink on the gaming front. Featuring maximum PCIe Gen 5 performance. Read rates of up to 12,000MB/s are possible.
With write speeds of 11,000MB/s, it is nearly twice as fast as PCIe Gen 4. Lexar will also demonstrate the award-winning NM800 PRO M.2 2280 NVMe SSD and its newest generation, which incorporates an integrated heatsink and capacities up to 8TB.
The PLAY M.2 2230 PCIe 4.0 SSD packs a lot of power into a small form factor, making it ideal for portable gaming consoles and M.2 2230 compatible laptops. It gives maximum read rates are 5200MB/s and write rates of 4700MB/s are supported, and the SLC dynamic cache is used to make load times and downloads quick.
Lexar will also demonstrate their ARES RGB DDR5 gaming DRAM, which clocks up at 8400MT/s and has timing as low as CL40.
About portable storage, Lexar will be showcasing its unmatched range of Portable SSDs, which includes the SL500 and ARMOR 700, both of which provide exceptional dependability and durability. The SL500 portable SSD is driven by Silicon Motion Technology portable SSD controllers and has read and write rates of up to 2000MB/s and 1800MB/s, respectively.
With storage capacities ranging from 1TB to 4TB, the Armor 700 Portable SSD boasts a robust construction that can withstand a 3-meter drop in addition to IP66 water and dust protection.
Its sleek aluminum form makes it easy to transport, and its broad compatibility makes it perfect for mobile devices, computers, cameras, Xbox, PlayStation, and other devices. It enables 4K 60FPS ProRes Apple Log video recording on the iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max in particular.
Featured Products
Lexar at CES 2024
Visit Lexar at The Venetian, Suite #29-104 (3355 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109) from January 9-12, 9 AM – 6 PM. All media are welcome to visit and experience our innovative new products.
Dante is an Information Technology graduate who is fascinated by technology especially computers. His passion for computers started when he was 11 years old, that inspired him to explore further. Besides writing, he also share his reviews on his YouTube channel.
